name: Topps Total Football
description:
A new world of collecting and playing trading cards is here as digital and physical strategic card games collide in Topps Total Football®.

COLLECTING INNOVATION. Collect digital trading cards of the biggest stars in world football, use them to compete in an incredible new strategic card game and then order your favourite copies to your door using our in-app e-commerce initiative!

OFFICIAL. Topps own the official license for the players and clubs of the UEFA Champions League®, UEFA Europa League® and UEFA Europa Conference League®.

EXPERIENCED HANDS. An easy to learn but difficult to master trading card game - built by some of the best trading card game players in the world!

TAKE ON THE WORLD. Every week, Total Football players around the world will compete in our PvP league system to prove who is the best around and reach the very top of the Total Football pyramid.

FIND THE BEST DEAL. The in-app trading system, with auction house functionality, allows you to trade for the cards you need to add to your collection and deck!

PERSONALISE YOUR GAME. With collectable cosmetics for Avatars, Banners, Footballs and Card Backs – you’ll be able to create your unique club identity and take them to the very top.

The App, Privacy Policy, Terms and Conditions and other supporting documents are only available in English, Deutsch, Français, Español, Italiano, Português, polski, русский языкpote, 日本語 and 中文. Please only download the App if you are able understand one of these languages.

For feedback and support, please email totalfootball@topps.com
